      • getHyperLinks

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHyperLinks()
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Get all the hyperlinks of this page. This method may return an empty list if the content-type of this page is not a text. Links are normilized, therefore relative links (eg. "my/path") are appended to the page URL.
        Returns:
        a list of all the links
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isCharacterContent

        public boolean isCharacterContent()
        Test the mime type of the response to be a text. Important for the pageContent to be readable.
        Returns:
        true if the mime is "text" otherwise false
